The ball was always angling away, and Iftikhar threw his bat at it without moving his feet, and Paine takes a stunning catch, diving in front of first slip and grabbing it with his outstretched right glove
back of a length, close to off stump. Defends with an angled bat, and he inside-edges it into the ground, and then his back pad. Could so easily have rolled back onto his stumps
beauty. Length ball angling into a tight fourth-stump line. Rizwan is unsure which way it'll go, and his feet aren't moving yet. Has a poke at it and the ball zips past his outside edge

got him, Starc is on fire! And another Pakistan batsman gets out to a poor, poor shot. Full, wide, tempting, but at Test level you're supposed to resist such temptations so early in your innings. Flashes at it, far, far away from his body, and gets a thin edge through to Paine
length ball on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
fullish, drifts onto the pads, clipped to the right of long leg
fullish, angling into off stump, defended to midwicket
full outside off, driven crisply but Labuschagne intercepts with a well-timed left hand at cover
jaffa. Goes wide of the crease, angles this into the fourth-stump channel, and gets it to straighten off the seam. Squares up Babar in defence and beats his outside edge
back of a length on off stump, defended to short mid-on
back of a length close to off stump, punched to cover

shortish, angling in from wide of the crease, angles it down leg. Yasir has a little nibble at it, looking for the leg glance. Did he get any bat on it? Tim Paine thinks so, the umpire doesn't. Australia have reviewed. No bat, both HotSpot and Snicko suggest it grazed his thigh on the way to the keeper
back of a length on off stump, defended to midwicket
length ball outside off, presses forward and jabs to point
yikes. That was back of a length, would have ended up hitting the top of leg stump. Looks to flick and squares up too early, ends up popping a leading edge towards cover
fullish, dangled invitingly outside off. Has a big drive at it and misses
full and wide once more, Yasir throws his bat at another big drive, and once again Starc fails to draw the edge. That should be the end of his spell today - it's been fast, and irresistible
back of a length close to off stump, defended off the back foot
length ball on off stump, clipped to the right of mid-on
past the edge again. That's three times in three balls for Yasir. Back of a length, angles into the corridor and seams away, and he's squared up while trying to defend
full, on middle stump, looks for the flick and ends up toe-ending it. Wanted to play that through midwicket, ends up hitting it down the ground, to the left of mid-on
back of a length outside off, punched to the right of backward point
length ball angling into off stump, Yasir defends into the on side, and lives to fight another day
on a length, straight, turned into midwicket
pitches outside leg stump, glances off the pad down the leg side
good length, at middle, 141kph, defended to the bowler
short of a length on the pads, flicked neatly off his hip to long leg
full outside off, defended square towards point
gorgeous shot, leans into a full delivery and plays the perfect on drive. That's picture-perfect
full outside off, confident stride forward and plays to cover
wider outside off, 138kph, left alone
in the channel outside off, good length, left alone
drives away from his body, on the up, finds cover
the first bouncer of the day, takes his eyes of it as he ducks underneath
short of a length, hops onto the fact foot and tucks to the length side. Australia won't mind that single
beats the outside edge with a full delivery pushes across that Yasir feels for
full outside off, 142kph, left alone
full at middle and off, 143kph, pushed to the covers
a short delivery, at the body, Yasir plays it well, keeping it down in front of his face
angles across outside off, 147kph, left alone
full outside off, brings the drive this time and finds deep point so Yasir steals the strike again
back of a length, angled in at middle and off, takes the thigh pad and bobbles to the leg side
good length outside off, driven to mid-on
back of a length at off stump, 139kph, defended
that's superbly played, Hazlewood drops in a short ball and Yasir swivels on a very well-controlled pull through square leg
back on a full length at the stumps, takes a thick inside edge and balloons into the leg side...no short leg in place
too straight, a lovely piece of timing off the pads as he flicks this through square to reach his half-century off 71 balls
good length at middle and off, gets squared up as he defends
good drive, gets forward and send this through the covers without quite timing it
a short ball outside off, Yasir makes the late decision to drop the gloves and sway out of the line
full at off stump, feet a little stuck in the crease as he defends
round the wicket and beats him outside off with a good-length ball that angles in towards off stump
strangled appeal for lbw as Yasir gets squared up by a good delivery on off stump that nips off the seam...not especially close
a short delivery, hooked to long leg so he loses the strike again
back of a length, forcing off the back foot and it bobbles into the crease
outside off, back of a length, punched off the back foot to cover
fuller, at off stump, defended on the front foot
gets forward into a good-length ball, drives to cover
very full outside off, driven through the covers
round the wicket, full outside off, pushed to short mid-on
full at off stump, 139kph, played to mid-off
short of a length at off stump, defended to the covers
that's a good one! Angles in from round the wicket, back of a length, zips past the outside edge
edged, through the gap in the slips and flies down to third man...third slip had been brought out, Yasir drove at a length delivery and it would probably have been straight to him
goes for the yorker, well dug out to the leg side...good little contest
opens the face and steers into the point area
full outside off, gets forward and defends to cover
full outside off, played to mid-on
a short ball outside off, defended on his toes
beats the edge with one that just nibbles away, a painful blow for Paine as it gets him on the end of the fingers
past the edge again, Yasir feeling for it outside off
short of a length, played to the on side
short outside off, Babar plays back and opens the face to angle it through backward point
nice length, just outside off with a hint of turn, defended
this takes the inside edge as he presses forward, goes to ground in front of short leg
tossed up very full outside off, nicely driven just wide of the diving mid-off
short of a length, defended on the back foot
short of a length at off stump, punched off the back foot to cover
fuller, outside off, steered into the point area
full outside off, 137kph, onto the front foot and driven to mid-on
short of a length, angled down the leg side
full at the stumps, punched on the up and goes in the air a little while towards mid-on
short outside off, defended on the back foot
good length outside off, brings him forward and defends
a shorter delivery, worked off the pads to square leg
fuller outside off stump, strides forward and defends
drives a full delivery to mid-off
flicked into midwicket from outside off
tossed wider outside off, Yasir flays a big drive and it flies off a thick outside edge through backward point
good length at off stump, 138kph, defended
a bouncer angled over leg stump, he ducks
full at off stump, blocked to the covers
a lovely drive on the up but well fielded at short cover by Labuschagne
fuller, at off stump, driven to the catching man at short mid-on
another bouncer, through to the keeper
defended on the front foot
tossed up fuller and wider outside off, brings a slog sweep which Yasir misses...Paine whips off the bails, but the back foot is okay
back defended, on the front foot
straighter delivery, defended to the on side
drives into the covers
edged, but just short of Smith at slip! Nicely bowled, a fraction wider, drew Yasir forward and it was a healthy nick which didn't carry. Smith too deep?
gone with a direct hit after a horrid mix-up in the running, Yasir pushed off the front foot into the covers...ball bounces over the stumps from Wade
leans forward into a nice drive through the covers...brings up the fifty stand
back of a length outside off, played with an open face into point
a bouncer, 139kph, ducks underneath
short of a length at off stump, shoveled into the on side
full and straight, think an inside edge saved him as he whipped across the line
shorter, straight, punched off the back foot to deep midwicket
full outside off, driven into the covers
defended on the back foot to the on side
very full outside off with some width, nicely driven to the left of mid-off but Cummins pulls out a full-length dive to cut it off
shorter, on off stump, he's back and across, tucks off the pads to deep square
defended from the crease
slips onto the pads and flicked away fine, Starc is able to get around
short of a length at off stump, tucked into midwicket
short delivery, neatly inside the line and worked to long on
a bouncer, he goes underneath
full and straight, flicked in the air but strongly through midwicket
short of a length at off stump, 140kph, defended at the top of the bounce
short outside off, punched to cover
flicked with his bottom hand to long-on
fuller, wider outside off, driven to cover
big stride forward outside off, pushed to mid-off
plays back and works this from off stump to the leg side
round the wicket, on off stump, defended
nice start, hits a good length at off stump, defended
touch short outside off, cut to deep point
dragged down short, Yasir pulls to deep midwicket
full at off stump, defended
touch wider outside off, driven to backward point
played off the front foot to the covers
round the wicket, pushed back to the bowlerr
shorter on the pads, whipped to backward square leg
fuller, outside off, pushed into the covers
plays back to quite a full delivery, defended off the stumps to the on side
full outside off, driven to mid-off
a shorter delivery, tucked through square leg
84kph, leg break, some real turn wide of off, he leaves

edged and it this taken at slip? Smith has taken the catch but he's unsure. The umpires send this upstairs and the soft signal is not out. He edged a leg break off the back foot and Smith has to dive low to his right. This may have hit the ground as he scooped it up. The third umpire is sure it's hit the ground. It certainly looked it. Not out remains.
shorter length, he's back and flat batting back to the bowler
tossed up, he drives to long on
lovely leg break outside off, he reaches out and defends on the front foot
fuller and wider, he square drives to the gap at point and they take a single as Head is stretching to his right
flighted from Lyon, he jumps down and is forced to defend
tossed up, he drives to mid off
nearly a bat pad catch! A thick inside edge off pad and loops just wide of a desperate diving Labuschagne. Beautifully bowled
shorter outside off, he's back and defending
tossed up outside off, he reaches out to smother it
tossed up, he skips out and yorks himself on the drive
tossed up outside off, he drives cover
shorter leg break, he's back and cutting firmly to deep point
87kph, looped wide of off, he thrashes a square drive to deep point
tossed up wide of off, he drives nicely but straight to cover
lovely leg break, closer to off, he defends off a thick edge to backward point
wider leg break, he's happy to leave
shorter on leg, he's back and working this behind square
missed stumping! Paine beaten by the bounce and spin, Yasir ran down widely, it ragged between bat and pad and Paine couldn't take cleanly
shorter length, he's back and mistiming a force off the back foot
tossed up, he pushes a defensive prod
shorter length, on middle, he's back and forcing to cover
looped up, on off, he steps forward and defends
drifting into off, he defends on the front foot
tossed up on leg, he works this wide of mid on for a single
short drag down wide of off, he's back and cracking this to deep point
short ball, outside off, he pulls firmly but straight to mid on
spinning leg break wide of off, he leaves
shorter and wider, he's back and cutting firmly to deep backward point, stretching the sweeper
shorter length, he's back and cover off stump
lopped nicely outside off, he reaches out and defends
shorter and quicker, and he late cuts but can't beat Head at backward point
tossed up on off, 88kph, he plonks the bat forward to defend
shorter length, some sharp turn, he's back and defending
looped up outside off, he's reaching out and defending
squared up by a ripping leg break, but he has soft hands and the edge goes down and wide of slip for a couple
beaten by a fabulous 89kph leg break. Sharp spin and bounce, pitching on off and zipping away
pitching on off, fuller, he defends on the front foot
shorter length leg break, wide of off, he's back and leaving
